headline: VICI Properties Inc. Increases Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, September 04, 2025--VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE: VICI) ("VICI Properties") announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.45 per share of common stock for the period from July 1, 2025 to September 30, 2025, representing an annualized amount of $1.80 per share and a 4.0% increase from the current dividend rate. The dividend will be payable on October 9, 2025 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on September 18, 2025.
